name: ANT1-C0VID
description:
—————————————————————————————————————————————

The disease has taken over the body, your job as a White Blood Cell is to collect the doses of medicine and take them to the heart. Be careful with the virus, you have not received the training to fight it, so you will not be able to harm it. Get to the stairs to continue moving forward, remember that if you protect the red blood cells, they may give you a surprise.

Controls: 

⬆️ Up ⬅️ Left ➡️ Right ⬇️ Down
